body: LEAD: Stewart Klonis, executive director of the Art Students League for 34 years until his retirement in 1980, died in his sleep on Saturday. body: LEAD: An article last Tuesday about Lisa Greene, a Brooklyn teen-ager who arranged a reunion with the firefighter who rescued her as a child, misidentified his unit and misstated the address of the fire. title: Corrections

body: LEAD: Lisa Greene was 3 years old when she was rescued from the smoke and flames that engulfed her family's two-story home in Brooklyn 14 years ago.
